LanguageData.EjectTimerDesc: Ejects the registered occupant from the vat when the timer elapses. Note that occupants will be ejected at 18 years of age regardless of this timer.
LanguageData.RecallTimerDesc: Recalls the registered occupant back to the vat when the timer elapses.
LanguageData.NoStartReason_NoAssignedPawn: No registered occupant for this vat
LanguageData.NoStartReason_PawnNotOnMap: {PAWN} is not on the same map as the growth vat
LanguageData.NoStartReason_PawnInVat: {PAWN} is already in the growth vat
